For Ms. Vee, she guides her students to become more confident in themselves, to embrace each other‚Äôs differences, feel hope for their future, and to become more disciplined and determined. She incorporates daily meditation and group circles daily in her class to help build a family community. She is always a light and positive spirit on our SPES campus.

She is now eligible to be named the national winner of the Sanford Teacher Award, which comes with a total award of $50,000 and will be announced at a future date. Let's wish her luck! We can not wait to see your classes this year!
